DisableBrowseForStudents.title: DisableBrowseForStudents
DisableBrowseForStudents.description: Controls whether the teacher can browse for students in order to create a class list. False = don’t allow, True = allow

EnableChannelSelect.title: EnableChannelSelect
EnableChannelSelect.description: Controls whether or not the teacher can change her channel. False Cannot change channel, True can change channel

AllowAudio.title: AllowAudio
AllowAudio.description: Controls whether the teacher can listen and talk to students via the console.

AllowTaskmanLimiting.title: AllowTaskmanLimiting
AllowTaskmanLimiting.description: Controls whether the teacher can prevent Task Manager/Activity Monitor from running  on student computers. Note that this does not activate the feature but merely enables it.

AlertOnUpdate.title: AlertOnUpdate
AlertOnUpdate.description: Controls whether the teacher is alerted when there is an update to LanSchool.

AutoApproveRemoteControl.title: AutoApproveRemoteControl
AutoApproveRemoteControl.description: Controls whether the teacher is asked for permission to be remote controlled by a LanSchool Tech Console.

DisableDataTransmission.title: DisableDataTransmission
DisableDataTransmission.description: Controls whether the teacher can change the network transport settings. True = cannot change, false = can change

NoRegistration.title: NoRegistration
NoRegistration.description: Controls whether or not the LanSchool Teacher Console prompts to register the product. False propts true does not prompt

DisableClassLists.title: DisableClassLists
DisableClassLists.description: Controls whether the teacher can use class lists. False = don’t allow, true = allow for some reason
